snippet: Organizers at fashion shows are seeking ever more creative ways to increase their front-row seating, without offending clients or violating fire-safety laws.
abstract: Organizers at fashion shows, including New York Fashion Week, are seeking ever more creative ways to increase their prized front-row seating without offending clients or violating fire-safety laws.
lead_paragraph: Organizers at fashion shows are seeking ever more creative ways to increase their front-row seating, without offending clients or violating fire-safety laws.

headline.seo: Squeezing One More in Fashion’s Front Row
headline.main: Can You Squeeze In One More?
headline.print_headline: Can You Squeeze In One More?
